title: GraphQL Formatter
description: GraphQL query formatting and parsing, with Facebook/Instagram API request decoding support
inputPlaceholder: Enter GraphQL query or FB/IG API request...

aboutDesc: GraphQL is a query language for APIs developed by Facebook. It provides a more efficient and powerful way to fetch data.
usageNote: Usage tip: Supports standard GraphQL syntax formatting and Facebook/Instagram API URL-encoded request parsing.
